If you were looking for one more reason to envy Chrissy Teigen and John Legend’s glamorous life, their nine-day yacht vacation in Corsica might just do the trick.

The two are enjoying the island with friends this week, and, unsurprisingly, Teigen has been soaking up the sun and sea in some pretty fabulous outfits, including a particularly glam one-piece nude swimsuit from Norma Kamali. The gold-studded, low-back style goes for around $600 (and if you’re currently trying to figure out how to make that work with your next paycheck, you’re not alone).

The suit is clearly a favorite of Teigen’s, as she was already seen wearing the same one in black last week while vacationing in the Mediterranean. The piece is also available in soft pink and clean white, for those looking to emulate Teigen’s gorgeous wardrobe.

In addition to lounging on the yacht and touching up her sunscreen with the help of her husband, Teigen also took her share of dips into the ocean, sharing a Boomerang of herself plunging into the water, donning the swimsuit and flippers and clutching her trusty pool noodle, with the caption: “I have to swim with noodles.”

John Legend also got in on the Instagram game, melting the hearts of millions when he shared this close-up of a sun-kissed Teigen, writing, “No filter necessary.”
title: Chrissy Teigen Loves This Swimsuit So Much She Owns It in Two Colors
